input.sentences: driving over to the fundraiser through a tunnel .
at the fundraiser there are a lot of activities for people to do .

output.sentences: We had a fundraiser by driving and I had to go through a tunnel.
There were a lot of people at the fundraiser.
There was a wooden station set.
There were plenty of platform games for all participants.
The fundraiser lasted till night time.
